data.title: Brian Salin - Territory Sales Manager at Newton Running Company
data.meta_description: Brian Salin started their work experience in 2011 as an intern at the City of Grapevine, where they gained experience in volunteer management, recreation p
data.text:
Brian Salin started their work experience in 2011 as an intern at the City of Grapevine, where they gained experience in volunteer management, recreation programming, and parks management. In 2012, they worked as a Recreation Assistant at the City of College Station, supervising recreational activities. Later that year, they became a Recreation Lead at the City of Southlake, coordinating recreational programs and working with children and adults with special needs. In 2012, they also joined Run On! as a Sales Associate, later becoming an Assistant Manager and participating in a Management Training Program. Brian then moved on to Newton Running Company, starting as a Product Specialist and later becoming an Inside Sales Representative and Territory Sales Manager. Throughout their roles at Newton Running Company, they focused on managing accounts, creating marketing and sales plans, and improving customer knowledge through direct channels and trade shows.

Brian Salin attended Texas A&M University, where they obtained a Bachelor of Science degree in Recreation, Parks, and Tourism Sciences in 2012. It is unclear when they started at Texas A&M University. Additionally, they attended NOLS, but no specific information regarding the degree or field of study is available.
